alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 145 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Buyck, or 12 miles northwest of Lake Vermilion, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Vermilion around 135 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
